comments.name: remarks
comments.value: Checks whether an enchantment can be added to the item stack.

comments.name: param
comments.value: The enchantment interface to be added.

comments.name: returns
comments.value: Returns true if the enchantment can be added to the item stack.

comments.name: throws
comments.value:
ScriptItemEnchantmentUnknownIdError: Exception thrown if the enchantment type does not exist.

ScriptItemEnchantmentLevelOutOfBoundsError: Exception thrown if the enchantment level is outside the allowable range for the given enchantment type.
